completedTasks.title: Basic Homepage Design
completedTasks.description:
Description
This is the HTMLCSSgraphic design of the basic homepage

inProgressTasks.title: The ability to create posts
inProgressTasks.notes:
Notes
Be careful to not introduce recursive dependencies on post creation
inProgressTasks.description:
Description
This is the user's ability to create posts and store them on their homepage

inProgressTasks.title: The ability to comment on posts
inProgressTasks.notes:
Notes
Be careful to not introduce recursive dependencies between comments
inProgressTasks.description:
Description
This is the user's ability to comment on others posts

startedTasks.title: Users have the ability to remove posts
startedTasks.notes: Ensure that users cannot accidentially delete posts from others
startedTasks.description: Users need the ability to delete their own posts. This requires a slight UI change in the form of a 'Delete Post' button, as well as adding a new database query in the backend

testingTasks.title: Users have the ability to create posts
testingTasks.notes:
Notes
This task has an implicit dependency on being ablue to view posts, however they can be developed concurrently
testingTasks.description:
Description
Users need to be able to view their own posts from a location other than their home page. This requires a new page be created, and properly linked to the homepage

peerReviewTasks.title: User account creation
peerReviewTasks.notes:
Notes
Make sure that passwords are not stored in plaintext - Management
peerReviewTasks.description:
Description
The front to back design of the User's ability to login and create user accounts

peerReviewTasks.title: User login
peerReviewTasks.description:
Description
The ability to interface with the created user accounts to successfully login
